ComicInfo.Summary: Thirteen Artifacts destroyed the Universe. Darkness bearer Jackie Estacado remade the Universe. Rapture bearer and defrocked priest Tom Judge has recruited Witchblade bearer Sara Pezzini to muscle Jackie into setting everything back to how it was. Will their triumph return the natural order of things, or will it make matters much, much worse?
ComicInfo.Title: Progeny, Part 1
ComicInfo.Characters: Valko Balakov,Tom Judge,Magdalena,Julie Pezzini,Hope Pezzini,Sara Pezzini,Finch,Doctor Rachel Harrison,Tilly Grimes,Jenny Romano,The Angelus,The Foreigner,Jackie Estacado,Witchblade
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Joe Weems,John Tyler Christopher,Marc Silvestri,Marco Turini,Steve Firchow
